org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.mediawiki.core
Class Template

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.mediawiki.core.Template

public class Template
extends Object

A representation of MediaWiki Templates, which provide a means to expand commonly-used content with token-replacement.

Since:
1.3

Method Detail

getTemplateMarkup

public String getTemplateMarkup()
the substitution content of the template

setTemplateMarkup

public void setTemplateMarkup(String templateMarkup)
the substitution content of the template

getTemplateContent

public String getTemplateContent()
The content of the template as it should be included in the document. The default implementation simply returns getTemplateMarkup(). Templates that produce dynamically generated content should override this method.

Since:
1.6

the name of the template
